short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab written with ❤️ in vanilla JS. Fast. Simple. Customisable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▪ No telemetry / ads.
▪ Rearrange grid with drag & drop.
▪ Custom wallpaper, including feeds!*
▪ Custom links & icons (recommend SVG).
▪ Custom grid density and padding (or blank).
▪ 24 hour clock (click in edit mode to disable).
▪ Follows system dark / light mode (or custom).
▪ Image cache (data URI converter) for speedy load times.
▪ Export / Import settings between browsers (cross-platform).

* Feeds: Chromecast, Bing, NASA APOD, Unsplash, Kittens, others...

Sample settings as seen in screenshots: https://tinyurl.com/NeoTabSet
Please donate to support development (https://paypal.me/auyousef).
